entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI TOP 2002/1. Operation and prospects of medium and big companies in Hungary.
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-F18: TÁRKI TOP 2002/1. Operation and prospects of medium and big companies in Hungary.. data sheet. Version: 2009-09-11
entry.dcterms:creator: Tóth, István János
entry.dcterms:description: market positions of companies in the processing industry and their prospects in the short run. property relations, economic information, product profile, market position of main product, employment, rentability, market expectations, production capacity, investments, transportation and invoicing practices, taxing, debts, foreign trade; financing, financial support
entry.dcterms:subject: business/industrial management and organisation
trade, industry and markets
labour and employment
economic organization
survey data
time-series

The sample was selected using a simple random sampling process from the biggest 1500 export and production companies based on the most recent Hungarian Central Statistical Office (KSH) registry. The dropped out addresses were replaced with supplementary addresses.
Telephone interview with the head of the company or a person nominated by the company head.
D
